Package kcls_manager.database

Class CommentsTable

java.lang.Object
kcls_manager.database.CommentsTable
public class CommentsTable
extends java.lang.Object
This class provides support for maintenance of the COMMENTS table.
Author:
jstra

      public void insertComment​(kcls_manager.main.Comment comment) throws java.sql.SQLException

    • updateComment

      public void updateComment​(kcls_manager.main.Comment comment) throws java.sql.SQLException
      Update a given row in the COMMENTS table. The row must previously have been fetched, and the commentsID set.
      Parameters:
      comment - the given row
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException - if a SQL exception occurs

    • deleteComment

      comment - the given row
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException - if a SQL exception occurs

    • deleteComment

      public void deleteComment​(int commentsID) throws java.sql.SQLException
      Delete a row in the COMMENTS table using a given row ID.
      Parameters:
      commentsID - the given row ID
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException - if a SQL exception occurs

    • getComment

      public kcls_manager.main.Comment getComment​(int ident) throws java.sql.SQLException
      Get a row from the comments table given the row's commentsID.
      Parameters:
      ident - the given commentsID
      Returns:
      the retrieved comment, or null if not found
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException - if a SQL exception occurs

    • getAllComments

      public java.util.List<kcls_manager.main.Comment> getAllComments() throws java.sql.SQLException
      Get all comments from the COMMENTS table.
      Returns:
      a (possibly empty) list of all rows in the COMMENTS table
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException - if a SQL exception occurs

    • getCommentsFor

      public void getCommentsFor​(kcls_manager.main.Title title) throws java.sql.SQLException
      Get all rows in the COMMENTS table that are associated with a given title. The retrieved comments are set in the given title object.
      Parameters:
      title - the given title object
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException - if a SQL error occurs

    • getCommentsFor

      public void getCommentsFor​(kcls_manager.main.Author author) throws java.sql.SQLException
      Get all rows in the A table that are associated with a given author. The retrieved comments are set in the given author object.
      Parameters:
      author - the given author object
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException - if a SQL error occurs
